attributes.additional_details: We keep putting has beens and no ones in eurovision and cosidering we help pay for the event we should take it more seriously and put a friendly talented face on it to bring it to the uk where the event would creat hype for the uk and bring in money to help our economy and after the olympics was so sucsessful this would be just as spectacular and unite europe and the eurovision in the country of its initial birth.bringing in jobs and also showing europe we are serious about the event may also help reignite our relations with them all
